ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: William Ross Cardon II
To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
Sent: Sunday, May 16, 1999 4:40 PM
Subject: Testament of Vanear, for research.


I have acquired a book called the Testament of Vanear as part of a quest. It is missing two pages which a NPC named Ran (Librarian in High Hold) supposedly stole. It appears that if these two pages are acquired and combined in the Testament that you will get a working copy of the Testament of Vanear.

I was wondering if this was a book for research, or it had another purpose.

Thanks in advance.
